xhr-plugins.body:
A registry of adapters to intercept XHR requests and decorate, re-route and or mock the request

* Used for cross-origin requests, to add CORS headers or pick a JSON-P transport

* decorate requests needing some auth token

* Mock requests in unit tests

* Normalize responses from different service end-points
